name: Red Skies At Night
description:
Play as a sea monster who has taken control of an abandoned cargo ship on your mission to destroy a sinister lighthouse. Rush to keep your sinking ship afloat as you navigate a dark ocean, all while staying out of the light.

Controls:
WASD - Move
A/D (when clicked on steering wheel or throttle) - Steer ship or change speed
Esc - Pause
Click - Interact
